backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling file, folder, mission, user profile storage, plus diagnostics and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of multiple frontend files and components.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation of creating a v114-synced draft baseline with full parity and validation steps.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loads the main React app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑freeze notice after restoring Live v114, outlining prohibited and allowed actions.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, icons, and startup settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, network-first fetch handling, and cache cleanup.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying full restoration of frontend to Live v114, covering flows, components, and behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app wrapper providing theme, actor, and upload contexts around the HomePage component.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component displaying actor initialization errors with retry, logout, and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated target-style gallery icon with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed subtle bottom line decoration for UI layout.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file cannot open externally, offering retry and download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Displays a dialog for previewing files with support for images, videos, PDFs, Office docs, and actions like download, delete, and moving files.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Provides UI for uploading files or creating external links, managing progress and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Renders a floating button that opens the folders view, with optional disabled and initializing states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog allowing creation, renaming, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen folder manager that supports creating, renaming, deleting, and selecting folders.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen media viewer with swipe navigation and actions like download, delete, share, and moving files.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files in a gallery with touch interactions, selection mode, previews, and external/open logic.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the top navigation bar with theme toggle, auth menu, and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a short animated splash screen that fades out after a timed sequence.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link fails to open, offering retry or copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that triggers Internet Identity login and shows loading state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full-screen mission editor showing tasks, file attachments, progress, and save/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating a new mission with title and task list management.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating action button that opens the missions interface, with disabled and loading states.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen missions list with creation, selection, swipe actions, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper component that displays children inside a mobile-only styled container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog that lists missions and moves selected files to a chosen mission using async mutations.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files to a folder or returning them to the main collection with performance logging.
Swipeable row component exposing edit and delete actions with pointer gesture handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Global upload progress bar showing total progress and item count.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with branding graphics and a login button for new users.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Context managing backend actor initialization, retry logic, error handling, and sign-out behavior.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Provides upload state management, batching, and progress updates using React context with throttled progress flushing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, and providing login/logout state through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer via matchMedia and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting missions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Empty file placeholder for future notes-related query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides file and folder query hooks plus upload handling with concurrency limits and performance diagnostics.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes and custom design tokens for UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component managing authentication state, folder/mission overlays, data fetching, and optional dev smoke-test execution.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines standardized actor initialization error messages and helpers to classify actor-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides utilities to open external URLs with popup‑block detection and to download files via blob links.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should be opened (viewer, office preview, or download) based on MIME type.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies files by MIME type, checks preview capability, and provides human‑readable file type labels.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Lightweight performance diagnostics tool that times operations when enabled via localStorage or URL param.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Developer utilities for inspecting React Query cache state and logging mission delete mutation lifecycles.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs a backend smoke test covering folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and list verification.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple promise-based concurrency limiter that queues tasks and runs them up to a specified maximum in parallel.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and enabling plugins for animation and typography.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical file list for frontend v114 used to validate 1:1 draft sync.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project's current state, features, issues, and performance-related startup improvements.
